Articles.Content:
mini aircraft:

\* good manuver

\* fast take-off

\* low thrust required to keep it in air

\* easy landing

**please share your toughts about it.**

ship file: [http://www.filedropper.com/ok_2](http://www.filedropper.com/ok_2)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bwf0EqBHjus?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

When I saw it I had a short giggle. It's so cute!

Here, have some rep!
That's definitely a tiny little bugger there.
